name: Retention
description: Set the retention for this Pipeline or Release.
author: Joost Voskuil (joost@foxhole.nl)

inputs.name: months
inputs.label: Pipeline: Number of months to retain
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the number of months to retain the build.

inputs.name: retainbuilds
inputs.label: Release: Retain Artifacs
inputs.helpMarkDown: Retains the builds (incl. artifacts) for the release that is deployed.
